      • QueryEmail

        public static String QueryEmail​(String email,
                                Enums.Format resultFormat,
                                Enums.SignatureMethod hashAlgorithm,
                                String user_email,
                                Enums.Environment environment)
                         throws IOException,
                                IllegalArgumentException
        This method is used to query an Email Address.
        Parameters:
        email - Transaction Email Address
        resultFormat - Format of the API response call. Valid values: JSON or XML.
        hashAlgorithm - Hash Algorithm. Valid values: "HMAC-SHA1", "HMAC-SHA256", "HMAC-SHA384","HMAC-SHA512"
        user_email - OPTIONAL. If provided, this field will be used to impersonate the API call.
        Returns:
        Result of the API call.
        Throws:
        IOException
        IllegalArgumentException

        hashAlgorithm - Hash Algorithm. Valid values: "HMAC-SHA1", "HMAC-SHA256", "HMAC-SHA384","HMAC-SHA512"
        user_email - OPTIONAL. If provided, this field will be used to impersonate the API call.

      • QueryEmailAndIPPlusExtraArgs

        public static String QueryEmailAndIPPlusExtraArgs​(String email,
                                                  String IP,
                                                  ExtraInputParameter extraArgs,
                                                  Enums.Format resultFormat,
                                                  Enums.SignatureMethod hashAlgorithm,
                                                  String user_email,
                                                  Enums.Environment environment)
                                           throws IOException,
                                                  IllegalArgumentException
        This method is used to query an Email Address + IP passing extra arguments, such as billing zip code, city, country and so on.
        Parameters:
        email - Transaction Email Address
        IP - IP of the transaction.
        extraArgs - Hash table containing a list of extra arguments.
        resultFormat - Format of the API response call. Valid values: JSON or XML.
        hashAlgorithm - Hash Algorithm. Valid values: "HMAC-SHA1", "HMAC-SHA256", "HMAC-SHA384","HMAC-SHA512"
        user_email - OPTIONAL. If provided, this field will be used to impersonate the API call.
        Returns:
        Result of the API call.
        Throws:
        IOException
        IllegalArgumentException

      • MarkEmailAsFraud

        public static String MarkEmailAsFraud​(String email,
                                      Enums.FraudFlag fraudType,
                                      Enums.FraudCode fraudCode,
                                      Enums.Format resultFormat,
                                      Enums.SignatureMethod hashAlgorithm,
                                      String user_email,
                                      Enums.Environment environment)
                               throws IOException
        This method is used to report cases where a confirmed fraud or confirmed good email is found at the customer site.
        Parameters:
        email - Email to be marked as either Fraud or Good
        fraudType - Value indicating the fraud type. Valid values: neutral, good and fraud.
        fraudCode - ID of the fraud code. Only required if you are marking an email as Fraud.
        resultFormat - Format of the API response call. Valid values: JSON or XML.
        hashAlgorithm - Hash Algorithm. Valid values: "HMAC-SHA1", "HMAC-SHA256", "HMAC-SHA384","HMAC-SHA512"
        user_email - OPTIONAL. If provided, this field will be used to impersonate the API call.
        Returns:
        Result of the API call.
        Throws:
        IOException
